venue.name: The American Legion: Nonatum Post No 440

item.description:
Il Gruppo Folcloristico "Ricordi d'Italia” presents   

                            their 35th Annual Carnevale

Dinner – Dance performing a multi-regional Italian folk song and dance.

Plus, enjoy an authentic 4-course Italian dinner provided by Maria’s Catering and dance the night away to the sounds of ‘The Ambrosiani Band’.


Saturday, February 23, 2013


American Legion Post #440
265 California Street, Newton, MA
Cocktails at 6:30 pm Dinner at 7:00 pm

Tickets are $55.00 per person

To purchase tickets, you may contact:

Michael Vivaldi at 781-606-2446 or by email at: mvivaldi_1971@yahoo.com


For more information about the group, please see the website: www.ricordiditalia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Everyone who buys a ticket from Michael, will be seated at the table(s) assigned to him and his guests

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Annual Carnevale Dinner, Newton, MA
